title: Individual progress in reading (TEFC)
creator_credit: Edward Milner, BBC-TV and Open University
brief_description:
Episode number 8 of Series “Reading Development”.
Examines the provision for individual progress in reading at two American schools. Two reading improvement specialists are seen operating different aspects of their respective reading programs. The schools are located on airbases in Oxfordshire.
